[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Standard Rental Contract

This Rental Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into on {{ doc.start_date }} between {{ doc.tenant_name }} (the "Tenant") and the property owner or manager, regarding the rental of the property {{ doc.property_name }}.

1. Rental Terms

Property: {{ doc.property_name }}
Tenant: {{ doc.tenant_name }}
Status: {{ doc.status }}
Rental Period: From {{ doc.start_date }} to {{ doc.end_date }}.
Payment Frequency: Every {{ doc.frequency }} month(s).
Monthly Rent: {{ doc.monthly_rent_tzs }} TZS.
Total Rent: {{ doc.total_rent_tzs }} TZS.
{% if doc.amended_from %}
Amended From: {{ doc.amended_from }}
{% endif %}

2. Tenant Obligations

  • The Tenant agrees to pay rent promptly and as agreed upon in this contract.
  • The Tenant shall maintain the property in good condition and use it for its intended residential purposes only.
  • Damages caused beyond normal wear and tear shall be repaired at the Tenant's expense.
  • Subleasing or assigning this contract without the prior written consent of the owner is prohibited.

3. Property Owner/Manager Obligations

  • The Owner shall ensure the property remains habitable and address any major repairs necessary.
  • The Owner will respect the Tenant’s privacy and provide notice before entering the premises.

4. Termination Conditions

  • Either party may terminate this agreement with prior written notice in accordance with local laws.
  • In the event of non-payment or breach of terms, the Owner retains the right to terminate the contract.
Authorized Signature: __________________________
Date: {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }}
"}]
name: Rental Agreement
